name: potion
effect:
Used on a friendly Pokémon
:   Restores 20 HP.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Restores the HP of
a POKéMON by
20 points.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Restores the HP of
a POKéMON by
20 points.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A spray-type wound medicine.
It restores the HP of one POKéMON
by 20 points.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
A spray-type medicine for wounds.
It restores the HP of one Pokémon by
just 20 points.

A spray-type medicine for wounds.
It restores the HP of one Pokémon by
just 20 points.

A spray-type medicine for wounds.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
A spray-type medicine for treating
wounds. It can be used to restore
20 HP to an injured Pokémon.

A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It can
